message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-end item that I'm confident you'll find very interesting. I'm open to negotiations, but I want to start with a price of $950000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to negotiate further to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
